Reviews.Title: “Basic Clean rooms, but this is a motel not a hotel”
Reviews.Author: PiyaliDasgupta
Reviews.Content: metropol hotel close riverside 12 kms aya sofiya blue mosque clean tiny elementary amenities teacoffee etc worn feel located congested narrow lane view bad overlooking construction buildings storage cramped houses breakfast buffet variety freshness staircase dirty reception dirty

Reviews.Title: “Tiny Rooms. Tiny Breakfast. Convenient Location.”
Reviews.Author: IndianaSud
Reviews.Content: backpacking cheap price opt metropole located near riverside main road lot eating options 5 mins aya sofiya blue mosque tiny 2 people suitcases luggage constrained space bath tiny staircase dirty elevator doesnt safe feel clean outside reception dirty pls street night noisy construction stay

Reviews.Content: highly recommended heart city nice clean friendly staff especially waiter serkan average breakfast doubt ill close attractions galata tower docks sultan ahmet walking distance didnt transporation 3 nights stay

Reviews.Content: cost pay deal clean service 24 hours truly quality holiday inn price breakfast variety continental expect lots restaurants monuments walking distance dont walk tram corner taxi stand corner convenient location comfortable stay

Reviews.Content: 9 days travelling turkey istanbul hotel metropol visited istanbul stayed hotel door metropol disappointed choice bit wary metropol provide return city pleasantly surprised staff pleasant nights quiet local nightlife streetfacing fine clean comfortable pillows decent quality worry disturbing colour pink decorated easily overlooked virtues hotel perfect choice visiting hagia sofia blue mosque topkapi palace grand bazaar taking boat trip bosphorus walking distance
